name: ncurses-pong
description:
This is a fun little pong game made developed in C using the ncurses library.  

There are 3 game modes: 

- Player 1 vs. Player 2

- Player 1 vs. CPU

- CPU vs. CPU  

Here's the link to the gitlab page: https://gitlab.com/Dobios/ncurses-pong 

The executable should only work on x86-64 machines.
